Title: Repeals section 37 of chapter 1 of the laws of 2013 relating to the definition of an assault weapon
Summary: Repeals provisions relating to the definition of an assault weapon.
ActClause: AN ACT to repeal section 37 of chapter 1 of the laws of 2013, amending the criminal procedure law and other laws relating to suspension and revocation of firearms licenses relating to the definition of an assault weapon
